about:
Hello! I'm Gustavo Ravel, a software engineer based in SÃ£o Paulo, and I'm excited to share some of my professional journey with you.

I have a solid background in software development and a burning passion for technology. Throughout my career, I have acquired valuable knowledge and skills that span multiple areas of software engineering.

My journey started with a solid background in back-end development, focusing on technologies like Django. I've worked on projects that involved building robust APIs and scalable systems that support end-to-end applications.

Furthermore, My curiosity led me into the world of web development, where I gained solid skills in technologies like React. I actively participated in the creation of several web projects.

My constant search for learning led me to explore the field of Data Science and Artificial Intelligence (AI). I have a background in data analysis and building AI models that drive data-driven decision-making.

I look forward to applying my knowledge and experience to projects involving web development, back-end, data science and AI. If you are looking for a professional who is passionate about technology and is willing to face complex challenges, I am available to discuss collaboration opportunities or exchange ideas about technology.
